title: Gameday Audio Background Images
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a live audio game feed
AND there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)
AND the device is connected to Charles proxy
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the audio feed
custom_expected:
THEN the audio background image should load
AND the user should see a GET Request for the image in Charles with the path: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/android/atbat/images/audiobackground/medium/%1$s_audio_header.png

title: Audio Notification Matchup Image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a live audio game feed
AND there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)
AND the device is connected to Charles proxy
custom_steps:
WHEN the user launches the audio feed
AND closes the app
AND opens the device's notification bar to view the audio player
custom_expected:
THEN the audio notification matchup image should load
AND the user should see a GET Request for the image in Charles with the path: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/ios/gameday/wrap/%s_%s.png

title: Chromecast Matchup Image
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a live Game Video Feed
AND there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)
AND the device is connected to Charles proxy
custom_steps: WHEN the user casts to a Chromecast device
custom_expected:
THEN the device should load the Chromecast matchup image behind the video controls
AND the user should see a GET Request for the image in Charles with the path: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/ios/gameday/wrap/%s_%s.png

title: Default Paywall Images
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)

custom_steps: WHEN the user hits the paywall
custom_expected:
THEN the default paywall image should load
AND the user should see a GET Request for the image in Charles with the path: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/android/atbat/images/paywall/%s/paywalltv_background.png

title: Wallpapers
custom_preconds:
GIVEN there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)
AND the user is logged in with AtBat Premium entitlements
AND the device is connected to Charles proxy

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user opens the Wallpaper tab from the Slideout Menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the MLB, AtBat, and Team wallpaper thumbnail images will load
AND the user should see a GET Requests for the image in Charles with the paths:
- MLB: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/thumbnails/mlb/mlb_wallpaper_thumb_01.png
- AtBat: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/thumbnails/mlb/atbat_wallpaper_thumb_01.png
- Team: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/thumbnails/teams/%s_wallpaper_thumb_01.png

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens the Wallpaper tab from the Slideout Menu
AND selects the MLB Wallpaper thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the *MLB* logo will load/render on the background
AND the user should see a GET Requests for the image in Charles with the path: 
MLB Logo: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/thumbnails/mlb/%s/mlb_wallpaper_logo_01.png
MLB Background: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/images/mlb/%s/mlb_wallpaper_01.png

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens the Wallpaper tab from the Slideout Menu
AND selects the AtBat Wallpaper thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the *AtBat* logo will load/render on the background
AND the user should see a GET Requests for the image in Charles with the path: 
AtBat Logo: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/thumbnails/mlb/%s/atbat_wallpaper_logo_01.png
AtBat Background: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/images/mlb/%s/atbat_wallpaper_01.png

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user opens the Wallpaper tab from the Slideout Menu
AND selects the Team Wallpaper thumbnail
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the *Team* logo will load/render on the background
AND the user should see a GET Requests for the image in Charles with the path: 
Team Logo: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/images/teams/%s/%s_wallpaper_logo_01.png
Team Background: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/images/wallpapers/images/teams/%s/%s_wallpaper_01.png

title: Network Logos (postseasonLogosURL)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN then app is in Postseason mode
AND there is a fresh install of AtBat QA (Clearing the app data also works)
AND the device is connected to Charles proxy
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the Postseason Tab
custom_expected:
THEN the network logos (TBS, ESPN, etc.) will load
AND the user will see a GET request in Charles to path: https://qa-clientcontent.mlb.com/ios/2017/postseason/NetworkLogos/Networks_%s@3x.png

title: In Market Streaming (IMS)
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the device is connected to Charles Proxy
AND the user is in the Rockies Blackout area
AND there is a freshly installed QA build of AtBat
AND the user has completed the test prep outlined below:
1. Download https://drive.google.com/open?id=1G0jQaJ6bZnLsN4pBf58U3gRBqsepCwU2and run the python script - this will create a JSON file called “IMS-Test.json” (needs to be specific to the current date to work)
2. In Charles, Go to Tools > Map Local 
3. Select Add
4. In the Edit Mapping window
     - Protocol: https
    - Host: qa-statsapi.mlb.com
    - Path: /api/v1/schedule
    - Query: *
    - Map To > Choose - find the IMS-Test.json that was generated by the python script
    - Press Ok
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the app and goes to the Rockies Team Page
custom_expected:
THEN the user will see the IMS Module
AND the IMS matchup image will load
